    public class OrderServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrderService

                                                     throws ServiceException
        Find all users for list of orders. The method, iterated over the list of transmitted order, receives for each order of its user and returns a map where each order corresponds to a user.

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.List<Item>> findItemForOrders(java.util.List<Order> orders)
                                                                     throws ServiceException
        Find all items for list of orders. The method, iterated over the list of transmitted order, receives for each order of its items and returns a map where each order corresponds to a list of items.
        Specified by:
        findItemForOrders in interface OrderService
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the map of items
        Throws:

      • payment

        public boolean payment(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paymentParameters,
                       java.math.BigDecimal totalSum,
                       Order order)
                throws ServiceException
        Payment order. The method calls the module to transfer data for payment to the bank and, in the event of a positive response from the bank, sets the order status paid and completes the transaction. In case of failure, the action is canceled.
        Specified by:
        payment in interface OrderService
        Parameters:
        paymentParameters - the payment parameters
        totalSum - the total sum
        order - the order
        Returns:
        true if success otherwise false
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if payment can't be handled

                    java.util.List<Cart> carts,
                    java.lang.String orderDetails)
             throws ServiceException
        Create order. The method creates a new order and saves it to the database with the status New.
        Specified by:
        create in interface OrderService
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        carts - the carts
        orderDetails - the order details
        Returns:
        the order
        Throws:
